script: There is a Town Hall in the center of my hometown.
Playground is a location in my home town, it is 4 KM, East from Town Hall.
I visited Museum, which is 1 KM, West from Playground.
High Street is a location in my home town, it is 2 KM, West from Museum.
Retail Area is a location in my home town, it is 3 KM, South from High Street.
And finally there is Statue of Founder which is West from Retail Area and 3 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from {origin} to {place} following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Town Hall, go 4km East to Playground.
From Playground, go 1km West to Museum.
From Museum, go 2km West to High Street.
From High Street, go 3km South to Retail Area.
From Retail Area, go 3km West to Statue of Founder.
